name: Iron Fist of the Demon King Chapter One (Improved Demo)
name_original: Iron Fist of the Demon King Chapter One (Improved Demo)
description:
In this Improved Demo, play as the Demon King as you set out to solve the mystery

of your sudden and bizarre transformation while attempting to regain control of your warward army of monsters. Included in this demo is the entirety of the game's first chapter, as well as some optional boss battles should you decide to brave them. Meet strange and interesting characters who will help and hinder your quest, fight dangerous foes and witness the power of playing as a Demon King.
